page.title: 09Recreation in our D_block
page.content: Recreation in our D_block follows a wide{variety of activities.}They vary from{football to gardening to golf to {fishing and snooker.}We asked the people in Bellfield, Shortlees and Riccarton what recreations they took part in during their spare time. We found that the most popular was gardening-16%, playing snooker-15%, then swimming-11%. 9% played pool, while jogging running tennis and golf had 7% each. Fishing with 6% was 2nd last and last of all was karate with only 3%. There are some clubs in our D_block, mainly fishing clubs, youth clubs, netball clubs, football clubs, and Riccarton and Bellfield bowling clubs.{In our schools we have hobbies {clubs}including hockey, model making, and bird watching.
